title: Patience
description: Jenna Ryan is the kind of girl everyone wants for a friend. Her spunky and carefree outlook on life often leads to trouble of the best kind. She's not afraid to speak her mind, and when it comes to her friends, she's fiercely loyal and protective. When she met Eric, she knew immediately he was her forever, but why was he holding back?Eric James is the epitome of a Greek God. He parties hard while trying to meet the expectations of his overachiever parents. When he met Jenna, sparks flew, and he knew he'd met his match. But Eric is hiding a small secret. When Jenna finds out, these two will embark on a wild and hilarious journey to torture each other into submission.Who will win? And who will learn the true meaning of... Patience?Patience (a Jenna and Eric novella) is a new adult contemporary romance intended for audiences 18+. As a part of the Choices series, it can be read stand alone, but is best if read in the series. All of your favorite characters make appearances in Patience.
author: Sydney Lane
